channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Artist (Blue Dragon Investigative) Painter (Unseen Support)
channel.description:
Artist (Blue Dragon Investigative)
Abilities
Passive: Hard At Work (Immune To Occupation)
Day: Paint Splash, Splash Paint in a player's face covering there screen for 10 seconds. (3 uses)
Night: Canvas of the Night, Paint a Canvas of a player, You will see the actions that occurred on that player last night (Converting will not be shown) (Unlimited Uses)
Night: Dip of Paint, Paint A player's door like another's confusing anyone that visits them (Aka swap targets) (2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat the Unseen or Neutral and Any neutrals that seek to do you harm
Painter (Unseen Support)
Day: Paint Splash, Splash Paint in a player's face covering there screen for 10 seconds. (3 uses)
Night: Redecorating: Redecorate a member of the unseen's room making them appear to be innocent (3 uses)
Night: Depressing Portrait: Use at night, makes the person the assassin kills appear to commit suicide (2 uses)
Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon and Any Neutrals that seek to do you harm.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Artist (Blue Dragon Investigative) Painter (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Icibalus:

Killer to Offensive makes sense, Investigative to Support does not.

Support to Offensive occurs
Support to Investigative occurs

this is the exact opposite of a problem

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Artist (Blue Dragon Investigative) Painter (Unseen Support)

Killer to Offensive makes sense, Investigative to Support does not.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Artist (Blue Dragon Investigative) Painter (Unseen Support)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

If people didn’t see a message that they left, they will know they didn’t commit suicide

pretty sure it tells you if they committed suicide, because otherwise it could throw in extra, unneeded uncertainty that was not caused by a players action that is at all beneficial to the user in any situation

Read full topic

confirm able for no reason
